sourcesContent:
import {Work,Play,Social,Study,SelfCare,Excercise} from "../SVG/MainSVG" function WorkStat(props){ const status=props.stat.title.toLowerCase().split(" ").length === 2 ? props.stat.title.toLowerCase().split(" ").join("-") : props.stat.title.toLowerCase() console.log(status) const components={ Work:Work, Play:Play, Social:Social, Study:Study, SelfCare:SelfCare, Excercise:Excercise } const Title=components[props.stat.title] return

{props.stat.title}

{props.stat.current}Hrs

Last week {props.stat.previous}Hrs

} export default WorkStat
